issue.title: Proxy request on column meta
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

When I configure a csw virtual service and I call a getrecords request : 
http://localhost/proxy/geonetwork?request=GetRecords&service=CSW&version=2.0.2&elementSetName=full&typeNames=csw%3ARecord

The proxy crashes because it try to make a SQL request on a 'meta' column on the 'resourcetype' table. But this column doesn't exist anymore.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
